SUCCESS: Payment successful! Your booking has been confirmed.
FAILED: Payment failed. Please try again or choose another payment method.
INVALID_SIGNATURE: Payment verification error. Please contact support.
INVALID_TIME: The check-out date must be after the check-in date.
ROOM_REQUIRED: At least one room must be selected
ROOM_NOT_FOUND: One or more rooms not found
SERVICE_NOT_FOUND: One or more services not found
ROOM_NOT_AVAILABLE: One or more rooms are not available for the selected dates
QUANTITY_MISMATCH: Number of quantities must match number of services
START_TIME_PAST: Start time cannot be in the past.
